message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper is about machine translation evaluation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). The most relevant sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which specifically deals with NLP and its applications. The paper also discusses automatic evaluation methods, which involve machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.AI a likely sub-category as well. The use of linguistic features and language models also suggests cs.LG (Machine Learning) as a possible sub-category. The paper also mentions correlation scores and quality estimation tasks, which are related to information retrieval (IR) and cybernetics (CY), respectively, making them potential sub-categories as well.
